import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/SearchTemplate" />

# Default Search Template Factory

```jsx
const DefaultSearchTemplateFactory = props => {

	const {Component = SearchTemplate, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedQuickSearch = R.compose(withQuickSearchCriteriaFields, withQuickSearchCategories)(QuickSearch);

	const ComposedSearchTemplate = R.compose(withSearchTemplateConfigLoader)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedSearchTemplate {...otherProps} QuickSearchComponent={ComposedQuickSearch} clipToViewport>
			{children}
		</ComposedSearchTemplate>
	);
};
```
